00025 #include <FdoStd.h>
00026 #include <fdo/Expression/Identifier.h>
00027 #include <fdo/Expression/ValueExpression.h>
00028 #include <fdo/Commands/CommandException.h>
00029 #include <common/IStreamReader.h>
00030 
00031 /// \brief
00032 /// The FdoPropertyValue class represents a property name/value pair. Instances of
00033 /// this class are used to specify or hold onto a reference to a property name
00034 /// and the properties value.
00035 class FdoPropertyValue : public GisIDisposable
00036 {
00037 protected:
00038 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00039     /// Constructs a default instance of an FdoPropertyValue.
00040     FdoPropertyValue();
00041 
00042     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoPropertyValue using the specified arguments.
00043     FdoPropertyValue(FdoIdentifier* name, FdoValueExpression* value = NULL);
00044 
00045     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoPropertyValue using the specified arguments.
00046     FdoPropertyValue(GisString* name, FdoValueExpression* value = NULL);
00047 
00048     virtual ~FdoPropertyValue();
00049 
00050     virtual void Dispose();
00051 /// \endcond
00052 
00053 public:
00054     /// \brief
00055     /// Constructs a default instance of an FdoPropertyValue.
00056     /// 
00057     /// \return
00058     /// Returns FdoPropertyValue
00059     /// 
00060     FDO_API static FdoPropertyValue* Create();
00061 
00062     /// \brief
00063     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoPropertyValue using the specified arguments.
00064     /// 
00065     /// \param name 
00066     /// Input property name as identifier
00067     /// \param value 
00068     /// Input value of property
00069     /// 
00070     /// \return
00071     /// Returns FdoPropertyValue
00072     /// 
00073     FDO_API static FdoPropertyValue* Create(FdoIdentifier* name, FdoValueExpression* value);
00074 
00075     /// \brief
00076     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoPropertyValue using the specified arguments.
00077     /// 
00078     /// \param name 
00079     /// Input property name as a string
00080     /// \param value 
00081     /// Input value of property
00082     /// 
00083     /// \return
00084     /// Returns FdoPropertyValue
00085     /// 
00086     FDO_API static FdoPropertyValue* Create(GisString* name, FdoValueExpression* value);
00087 
00088     /// \brief
00089     /// Gets the property name as an identifier.
00090     /// 
00091     /// \return
00092     /// Returns identifier
00093     /// 
00094     FDO_API FdoIdentifier* GetName();
00095 
00096     /// \brief
00097     /// Sets the property name as an identifier.
00098     /// 
00099     /// \param value 
00100     /// Input identifier
00101     /// 
00102     /// \return
00103     /// Returns nothing
00104     /// 
00105     FDO_API void SetName(FdoIdentifier* value);
00106 
00107     /// \brief
00108     /// Sets the property name as a string.
00109     /// 
00110     /// \param value 
00111     /// Input string
00112     /// 
00113     /// \return
00114     /// Returns nothing
00115     /// 
00116     FDO_API void SetName(GisString* value);
00117 
00118     /// \brief
00119     /// Gets the value of the property as an FdoValueExpression.
00120     /// 
00121     /// \return
00122     /// Returns FdoValueExpression
00123     /// 
00124     FDO_API FdoValueExpression* GetValue();
00125 
00126     /// \brief
00127     /// Sets the value of the property as an FdoValueExpression.
00128     /// 
00129     /// \param value 
00130     /// Input value
00131     /// 
00132     /// \return
00133     /// Returns nothing
00134     /// 
00135     FDO_API void SetValue(FdoValueExpression* value);
00136 
00137     /// \brief
00138     /// Sets the value of the property as a string. The string content 
00139     /// will be parsed to produce the required FdoValueExpression.
00140     /// 
00141     /// \param value 
00142     /// Input value
00143     /// 
00144     /// \return
00145     /// Returns nothing
00146     /// 
00147     FDO_API void SetValue(GisString* value);
00148 
00149     /// \brief
00150     /// Provides a Reader on a external data source to allow reading 
00151     /// in blocks of data.
00152     /// 
00153     /// \param stream 
00154     /// Input reference to a stream reader
00155     /// 
00156     /// \return
00157     /// Returns nothing
00158     /// 
00159     FDO_API void  SetStreamReader(GisIStreamReader *stream); 
00160 
00161     /// \brief
00162     /// Gets the value of the property as an Stream Reader.
00163     /// 
00164     /// \return
00165     /// Returns GisIStreamReader
00166     /// 
00167     FDO_API GisIStreamReader* GetStreamReader();
00168 
00169 private:
00170     FdoValueExpression      *m_Value;
00171     FdoIdentifier           *m_Name;
00172     GisIStreamReader        *m_StreamReader;
00173 };
00174 #endif
